Posts.Content: I finished chemo in Feb rang my bank to ask about my insurance with them they have added to my notes that I had b/c a mastectomy and finished chemo and were happy to continue the insurance...flew to Costa blanca in March and July. Depends on your bank mine is Lloyd they said as long as my treatment had finished ( told them was on tamoxifen) and I didn't have a terminal diagnosis it was fine. Hope that helps.
Posts.Title: Anyone recommend a . good travel insurance comp after chemo's ?
